sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>teacher</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> is happiest because they get to <kanji>teach</kanji>! The kids can't go out and play because it's too cold. They all have to come in and stay warm as the teacher teaches!
meaningInfo: Picture a teacher excitedly teaching, bundled up in the cold. Snow falling outside. Grumpy children being taught inside.
readingMnemonic: Teachers can teach the most about Japan in winter by going to <reading><ja>きょう</ja></reading><ja>と</ja>. <ja>きょうと</ja> is where all the old temples and history of Japan is centered. And it's really gorgeous when it snows.
readingInfo: Imagine the teaching teacher teaching you about Japan in <ja>きょうと</ja> in winter. You've always wanted to go to <ja>きょうと</ja>!
